author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Four Men Arrested for Allegedly Holding a Woman Captive Inside Her Home to Rob Her Stimulus Check
description: The men, who knew the victim, broke into a Lake Station, Indiana, home after finding out she had received her $1,200 check.
content:
Four men were arrested after they allegedly broke into a woman's home and held her captive for hours to rob her of the government stimulus check sent out to help struggling Americans during the coronavirus pandemic.
The woman, who was not named, reported the… [+5241 chars]
